name: The Experiment's of Doctor Proctic
description: The Experiments of Doctor Proctis is a Virtual Reality game developed by Jonah Morris and Lyn Lu for Unreal's 2019 Summer Game Jam. Play as a hostage inside of Doctor Proctis home and try to solve all his experiments in time to be allowed to leave. If time runs out before you've solved all his puzzles you will stay forever.
